title: Welcome To My Blog
text:

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: German quotation marks for Quarto
text:
By default, Quarto does not localize quotation marks in HTML documents even if you specify a language with lang: in the document header. In German for example we use curved quotation marks – on the level of the commas as an opening mark and at the level of apostrophes as a closing mark1.
To solve this problem, you need to use a Lua-filter for pandoc, which converts your document to html.
